newsitem.title: GERMANY: Munich transport trade fair draws 750 exhibitors.
newsitem.headline: Munich transport trade fair draws 750 exhibitors.

text.p: More than 750 transport industry companies and organisations will have stands at or attend the 6th International Trade Fair for Logistics, Freight and Passenger Transport, organiser Messe Muenchen GmbH said.
Some 18 international airlines and airports will be among exhibitors from 30 countries at the June 10-14 show in Munich, a statement said.
The previous event, in 1994, drew more 26,000 trade visitors from 66 countries, it added.

Speakers at an air cargo forum on Friday, June 13, include Joachim Haas, of Lufthansa Cargo, Helge Westerholt, of Siemens KWU and representatives of Schenker International and Frankfurt airport (FAG).
Other forums cover logistics, rail and road transport, trans-European networks, telematics, sea and inland ports,
At a two-day China information event, Chinese ministry and authority officials will outline infrastructure and development projects. --Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom. Tel +44 171 542 7706; Fax: 5017
